snippet.title: Dreamfall Chapters - Two Worlds Trailer [US]
snippet.description:
The fate of Worlds falls on you now! Follow the story of Zoë & Kian in the sequel of the award-winning The Longest Journey saga.
Coming to PlayStation 4 and Xbox One on May 5. 2017!
